ENGLISH: Captain-General is the highest honorary title in the Kingdom of Gondor, second only to the King of Gondor. It can only be granted to close relatives, traditionally the oldest son.
FRENCH: Le Capitaine-Général est le second titre le plus élevé du Gondor, après l'Intendant ou le Roi lui-même. Il ne peut être donné uniquement à un proche, généralement le fils aîné.
ITALIAN: Il Capitano-Generale è il più alto titolo onorifico nel Regno di Gondor, secondo, per importanza, unicamente a quello del Re o del Sovrintendente. Può essere conferito unicamente a membri della famiglia, di solito al figlio più anziano.

ENGLISH: Warden of the Keys is a high office of Minas Tirith in Gondor. At the coronation of new a new King, the holder of the keys opens the gate to the city.
FRENCH: Le Gardien des Clés est un poste important à Minas Tirith. Lors du couronnement d'un Nouveau Roi, le Gardien des Clés lui ouvrira les portes de la cité
Capitaine de la Garde de la Fontaine

ENGLISH: Commands the Fountain Guards who protect the White Tree of Gondor
FRENCH: Le Capitaine de la Garde de la Fontaine est en charge de la protection de l'Arbre Blanc du Gondor
Capitaine des Guardes de la Citadelle
Il commande les gardes de la Citadelle de Minas Tirith.

ENGLISH: The Admiral of Pelargir is the Commander of Gondor's Navy.
FRENCH: L'Amiral de Pelargir est le commandant des forces navales du Gondor.

ENGLISH: Honorary member of the Citadel Guard

Lieutenant-General is the second highest honorary title in the Kingdom of Gondor, second only to the King of Gondor and Captain-General. It can only be granted to close relatives, traditionally the oldest son of the heir.
The Third Marshal of the Riddermark is the third highest military rank among the Riders of Rohan.
The Second Marshal of the Riddermark is the second highest military rank among the Riders of Rohan.
The First Marshal of the Riddermark is the highest military rank among the Riders of Rohan.
Warden of the Stone of Erech
This character shares the Rules of Gondor with one of his peers. Together, they direct the destiny of the Southern Kingdom.
FRENCH: Ce personnage partage le pouvoir du Gondor avec l'un de ses pairs. Ensemble, ils dirigent la destinée du Royaume du Sud.
